author: Brian Turner
method: Place all of the ingredients, except the chervil leaf, into a food processor and blend to a purée. To serve, place into a small bowl and garnish with the chervil leaf.
ingredients: 2 tbsp olive oil,  1 clove garlic,  15g/½oz chervil,  100g/3½oz potato, peeled, chopped and boiled until soft,  50g/1¾oz haddock, poached and flaked,  salt and freshly ground black pepper, to taste,  chervil leaf, to garnish
